prompts.name: Confidence Script
prompts.text: Create a 30-second confidence script for a dyslexic learner before reading practice.

prompts.name: 60-Second Calm Reset Script
prompts.text:
60â€‘second calm reset (read slowly):

1) Soften your shoulders.
2) Breathe in gently through the nose.
3) Pause for one beat.
4) Breathe out longer than you breathed in.
5) Notice one thing you can do nextâ€”small and easy.

Repeat once if needed.
